snippet: The Prague Castle has put the Treasury of St. Vitus Cathedral, the largest church treasury in the Czech Republic and one of the most extensive in Europe, on view permanently.
abstract: The Prague Castle has put the Treasury of St. Vitus Cathedral, the largest church treasury in the Czech Republic and one of the most extensive in Europe, on view permanently.
lead_paragraph: The soft illumination at the Chapel of the Holy Cross at Prague Castle has taken on a golden hue lately. Its source: the lighted display cases, which currently hold the Treasury of St. Vitus Cathedral, the largest church treasury in the Czech Republic and one of the most extensive in Europe. Items from the collection are on view permanently.

headline.main: St. Vitus Treasures Now in Brilliant Display at Prague Castle
